name: 404-not-found
description: This repository offers you a charming solution to handle those pesky 404 errors. Why settle for a simple error message when you can enjoy the company of an adorable kitten? Because no one likes 404, but we all love kittens! This touch of charm adds a bit of joy to a frustrating situation. We hope this page makes those 404 errors a little more bearable for your visitors!
